Class: PermissionsMixin. It's a mixin for Django's auth system. Adds fields and methods to support Group and Permission model using ModelBackend. Methods: getters for all permissions, group permissions; helpers for checking module permissions, specific permission, multiple permissions.

So summary: A reusable mixin that equips a user model with permission-related fields (groups, user_permissions) and provides methods to retrieve and evaluate permissions, integrating with Django's authentication backend.

Business intent: To enable custom user models to participate in Django's permission framework, allowing role-based access control and permission checks throughout the application.

Keywords: permission, group, mixin, Django, authentication, access control, user model, backend, has_perm, has_perms, module permissions, getter.
